title: Appointment of an Officer to the post of Director General of Combined Services
decision_details: - The post of Director General of Combined Services, has fallen vacant with the appointment of Mr. S. Alokabandara, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Administrative Service,who served in the above post, to the post of Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration, Provincial Councils and Local Government. Taking into consideration the wide scope of duties assigned to the post of Director General of Combined Services, it is necessary to appoint an officer to the post on permanent basis. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Public Administration, Provincial Councils and Local Government to appoint Mr. N.U.N. Mendis, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Administrative Service, who is presently serving as an Additional Director General of the Department of National Budget, to the said post, was approved by the Cabinet.
